about.name: Olexandr Oliiynychenko
description: Mathematician by education. Worked at the Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences until 2003. Over the next 10 years, progressed from sales manager to head of a distribution company (FMCG).
In 2013, shifted to internet marketing, promoting various educational projects. Since 2016, focused on what truly inspires me â€” web development and UX design.
